text.text: The Company has conducted a 15,000m drill program at Graal
The program targeted the Bouguer Anomaly. The company is seeking to identify significant amounts of nickel-copper-sulphide mineralization at the base of the magmatic chamber.
Early-stage drill results have been excellent
Initial drilling intersected massive sulphides with assays for the first three drill holes indicating up to 2.08% nickel and 3.75% copper. Lab results are still pending.
